welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Urdorf, a charming and picturesque city nestled in the Swiss countryside. Explore our quaint streets, sample our famous Swiss chocolates, and soak in the beauty of our surroundings. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zurich Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zurich Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Zurich Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights and Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buochs Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buochs Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
